law.text:
The sales and use tax does not apply to the sale of a right to occupy a room or lodgings as a transient guest at a dormitory or other lodging facility that:
is operated solely in support of a corporate or any other headquarters, training, conference, or awards facility or campus;
provides lodging solely for employees, contractors, vendors, and other invitees of the corporation that owns the dormitory or lodging facility; and
does not offer lodging services to the general public.
